document_data.name: Jewel and Gemcutting
document_data.mainbody: '''''Jewel and Gemcutting''''' was a trade [[book]] detailing a number of trade secrets regarding the art of cutting and setting precious [[gem]]s.
document_data.Description: Copies of this book were bound within [[copper]] covers.
document_data.Price: A copy of this book was generally worth around 250 [[gold piece]]s, though jewlers and [[thieves]] guilds would pay someone twice that amount for one.
document_data.History: Copies of this tome were owned by the [[Jewelers' Guild]] of [[Waterdeep]]. Some time before the early-14{{th}} century [[DR]], the guild donated one of these to [[Bard Keep]], a library and temple of [[Oghma]] that stood within [[the North]] near [[Silverymoon]].
